Interface SignConfig

All Superinterfaces:
SonarObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
SignConfigImpl
public interface SignConfig extends SonarObject
A sign configuration defines the dimensions of a sign.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter
